sentences.en: City prayers were vain against the great rural potentate.
sentences.cn: 城市里的祈祷文对于乡村中这个了不起的有权有势的人竟然毫无用处.

sentences.en: From aproned pot - scrubber to the flanneled potentate, everybody liked me, everybody petted me.
sentences.cn: 不论是围着围裙的陶艺大师还是穿着法兰绒大衣的政治家, 每个人都喜欢我, 都爱逗我玩.

sentences.en: From the aproned pot scrubber to the flanneled potentate, everybody liked me, everybody petted me.
sentences.cn: 从系围裙的擦锅工到穿法兰绒的权贵, 人人喜欢我, 人人宠我.

sentences.en: People rose up against the despotic rule of their potentate .
sentences.cn: 人们起来反抗君主的专制统治。

sentences.en: People rose up against the despotic rule of their potentate.
sentences.cn: 我们的校长是个专横的人.

words.tran_cn: 有效的；强有力的，有权势的；有说服力的
统治者，君主；有权势的人

trans.tran_cn: 君主，统治者，有权势的人
trans.tran_en: A potentate is a ruler who has complete power over his people
